original: // lta ba yang dag sgron ma bzhugs /
analyzed: lta ba yang dag sgron ma bzhugs

original: dpal ldan thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i 'od stong gis //
analyzed: dpal ldan thugs kyi dkyil khor nyi ma d stong gis

original: shin tu 'bar ba'i zer tsam bdag blo mun par byung //
analyzed: shin tu bar ba zer tsam bdag blo mun ba byung

original: dbyangs dang tshig 'das nam mkha'i mtshan nyid las 'das pa'i //
analyzed: dbyangs dang tshig da nam mkha mtshan nyid las da ba

original: rang sems skye med zab mo'i don gyi phyogs tsam snang //
analyzed: rang sems skye med zab mo don gyi phyogs tsam snang

original: rang gis rtogs pa mkhas pas gsungs pa'i rnam mang ba //
analyzed: rang gis rtogs ba mkhas ba gsungs ba rnam mang ba

original: rtog ge bdag 'dra'i spyod yul brtsam par mi 'os kyang //
analyzed: rtogs ge bdag dra spyod yul brtsam ba mi s kyang

original: rig pa'i brjod byang tsam 'di nges don mos rnams kyi //
analyzed: rig ba rjod byang tsam di nges don mos rnams kyi

original: chos phyir 'brang ba'i blo yis dpyad cing goms par bya //
analyzed: chos phyir brang ba blo yis dpyod cing goms ba byed

original: bskal pa mang por rgyal ba rnams la ni //
analyzed: bskal ba mang por rgyal ba rnams la ni

original: dge rtsa bskyed cing rang sems sbyangs pa yis //
analyzed: dge rtsa skyed cing rang sems sbyong ba yis

original: rnal 'byor dam pa nges pa'i lung chen ma //
analyzed: rnal byor dam ba nges ba lung chen ma

original: shes rab mchog ldan rig pa'i mos blo gsal //
analyzed: shes rab mchog ldan rig ba mos blo gsal

original: rnam par mi rtog don dam rang bzhin gyi //
analyzed: rnam ba mi rtogs don dam rang bzhin gyi

original: rig pa'i tshul chen sems kyis dmigs pa ni //
analyzed: rig ba tshul chen sems kyis dmigs ba ni

original: lung dang man ngag rigs pas thag bcad de //
analyzed: lung dang man ngag rigs ba thag gcod de

original: chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag yid ches bya //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag yid ches byed

original: ji ltar nam mkha' la ni tha snyad du //
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha la ni tha snyad du

original: ming dang tshig gis brjod par byed mod kyi //
analyzed: ming dang tshig gis rjod ba byed mod kyi

original: mtshan ma med cing spros dang bral ba ste //
analyzed: mtshan ma med cing spros dang bral ba ste

original: ngo bo nyid kyis sems kyi yul la 'das //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis sems kyi yul la da

original: ji ltar smig rgyu'i phung po snang ba dag /snang ba nyid na nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar //
analyzed: ji ltar smig rgyu phung po snang ba dag ba nyid na nam mkha rang bzhin ltar

original: de bzhin chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang //
analyzed: de bzhin chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang

original: snang ba nyid na mtshan med nam mkha' bzhin //
analyzed: snang ba nyid na mtshan med nam mkha bzhin

original: rgya che rab zab theg mchog yangs pa'i lam //
analyzed: rgya che rab zab theg mchog yangs ba lam

original: don dam dmigs med spros pa kun las 'das //
analyzed: don dam dmigs med spros ba kun las da

original: bdag dang chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa yi //
analyzed: bdag dang chos kyi dbyings su mnyam ba yi

original: dbu ma'i don can blo yis go bar byos //
analyzed: dbu ma don can blo yis go ba byos

original: yang dag don dam cig car go nas ni //
analyzed: yang dag don dam cig car go nas ni

original: yod med la sogs sems kyi yul 'das shing //
analyzed: yod med la sogs sems kyi yul da shing

original: re dang dogs pa'i mtha' ni rab spangs nas //
analyzed: re dang dogs ba mtha ni rab spong nas

original: rtsol ba med pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam par bya //
analyzed: rtsol ba med ba brtson grus brtsam ba byed

original: chos rnams thams cad ye nas ro gcig phyir //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad ye nas ro gcig phyir

original: sgom pa dang ni bsgom bya'ang dmigs su med //
analyzed: sgom ba dang ni bsgom byed dmigs su med

original: sems nyid ye nas chos nyid yin shes na //
analyzed: sems nyid ye nas chos nyid yin shes na

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid gzhan du bsgom mi dgos //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid gzhan du bsgom mi dgos

original: rmi lam dag gi bde dang sdug bsngal dag /sad par gyur na rang bzhin mnyam pa ltar //
analyzed: rmi lam dag gi bde dang sdug sngal dag ba gyur na rang bzhin mnyam ba ltar

original: rnam par rtog dang mi rtog gnyis ka yang //
analyzed: rnam ba rtogs dang mi rtogs gnyis ka yang

original: shes pas rig na rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam //
analyzed: shes ba rig na rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam

original: de ltar dus gsum rnam par dag pa dang // rang bzhin nyid las ma 'das shes na ni //
analyzed: de ltar dus gsum rnam ba dag ba dang rang bzhin nyid las ma da shes na ni

original: sgro 'dogs bus pa'i rjes su ma 'brangs nas //
analyzed: sgro dogs bud ba rjes su ma brang nas

original: rang bzhin nyid du yong gis bcos mi dgos //
analyzed: rang bzhin nyid du yong gis chos mi dgos

original: ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan ma med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha mtshan ma med ba phyir

original: nam mkha' de nyid bsgom par mi 'gyur bzhin //
analyzed: nam mkha de nyid bsgom ba mi gyur bzhin

original: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes sems kyis ni //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skye sems kyis ni

original: ma skyes de nyid bsgom par ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: ma skye de nyid bsgom ba ga la gyur

original: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po dbyer med don //
analyzed: mi mthun ba dang gnyen po dbyer med don

original: rang gis shes na rtsol ba kun spangs te //
analyzed: rang gis shes na rtsol ba kun spong te

original: btang snyoms chen por ma bcos ngang bzhag na //
analyzed: gtong snyom chen por ma chos ngang jog na

original: tha snyad tsam du'ang bsgom zhes de la bya //
analyzed: tha snyad tsam du bsgom zhes de la byed

original: skyon dang yon tan gnyis po ma skyes phyir //
analyzed: skyon dang yon tan gnyis po ma skye phyir

original: rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma ci byung yang //
analyzed: rnam ba rtogs ba mtshan ma ci byung yang

original: ma bkag rang byung ma 'brangs rang zhi ste //
analyzed: ma gog rang byung ma brang rang zhi ste

original: ma bcos ma byas rang gi ngang gis rgyal //
analyzed: ma chos ma byed rang gi ngang gis rgyal

original: lta ba yang dag sgron ma rdzogs so ////gnyan +aa tsar+ya dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: lta ba yang dag sgron ma rdzogs so +aa tsar+ya dpal dbyangs kyis mdzad ba
